text: As a redemption-price for the two hundred and seventy-three firstborn of the Israelites over and above the number of the Levites,
Thus they assembled and went to Mizpah near Jerusalem, because formerly at Mizpah there was a place of prayer for Israel.
They have opened their mouths against us, all our enemies;
Now the kingâ€™s servants who had thrown them in continued to stoke the furnace with naphtha, pitch, tow, and brush.
